wordGroup: disobey the rules 违抗规定

sentences.en: It was wrong of me to disobey father and to run away from home.
sentences.cn: 我不听父亲的话，离家出走，这是不对的。

sentences.en: In case you do disobey, you will be the one to suffer, not anyone else.
sentences.cn: 万一你不听话，吃苦头的将是你，而不是别人。

sentences.en: Those who disobey will be severely punished.
